titleStmt.title: Information for my Lord and Lady Nairn, David Falconer of Newtoun, and Michael Balfour of Forret; against the Earl of Argyl.

notesStmt.note: Refutes the allegation by the Earl of Argyll that the heirs and representatives of Lord Nairn, David Falconer and Michael Balfour should be held liable for the wrongful sentence of the former Earl of Argyll.
Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
